interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: NATWAG Reusable Update Makeup Remover Cloths for Sensitive Skin - Microfiber Face Cloth Makeup Remover | Washable Round Makeup Remover Pads | Natural Facial Towels (2 Pads,2 Cloth) (Purple)
Review Date: 2021/03/13
Store: Natwag
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Natwag', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive,All Skin Types', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '12.75 x 9.88 x 0.59 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '745103569978'}
Review Text: This thing is amazing and the material so soft against my skin. It was able to get off my super stay lipstick that I usually need lipstick remover for. I use the small ones for my lips and eyes and the big one (it’s actually a really big cloth) I use for my face.
Review Title: So soft
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
5 Pack Travel Paper Soaps, Hand Washing Soap Paper Sheets, Portable And Replaceable Pocket Hand Soap For Travel, Outdoor, Camping Hiking, 1.2m/47inch Length Each, 5 Color/Scents
VEAFX
{'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'VEAFX', 'Scent': 'Lavender, Tea Tree, Rose, Lemon, Lily', 'Material Feature': 'Biodegradable Warning', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 3.7 x 0.6 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '782912939165'}
They’re pocket sized and fit in my palm. So convenient for those public restroom trips that have run out of soap, just pop this out and you’re good to go. Be careful with taking it out though, I thought it came out in sheets but it’s more like foil paper where you cut the size you want. A small sheet should be good enough. It also has a subtle scent to it but it smells good. This is a must have product.
So convenient
8inch Short Afro Puff Synthetic Hair Bun Chignon Hairpiece For Women Drawstring Ponytail Kinky Curly Updo Clip Hair Extensions(1BT-30#)
BURHAIR
{'Material': 'synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Coily', 'Brand': 'BURHAIR', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'UPC': '782947259672'}
I don’t know if it’s because of the way it was sewn, but no matter what I do, I can’t get this to look right. The base of it always sticks out straight no matter how I situate it. Maybe it’s just me? I gave 3 stars because the hair is soft and the color is ok. I wish there was more black in it though instead of just color.
Not a fan.
RAREKIND Fade Matte Lipstick by Amorepacific - 10 Colors, Cruelty-Free Nourishing Lip Stick, Velvety-smooth, Long-Lasting Moisturizing Lipstick - 3.2g Maple Road
RAREKIND
{'Package Dimensions': '3.3 x 0.9 x 0.9 inches; 0.95 Ounces'}
I like how the matte of this (I got maple road) came out on me. I only put a single layer and the color came out great. The color became darker once a couple minutes passed. There is easy transference of this and you’ll definitely need a touch up after eating and drinking. Liked the way it smoothed on and how I barely felt it on.
Lovely color
Unny Club Black Square Lipstick (Libidream) | matte lipstick
UNNY CLUB
{'Brand': 'UNNY CLUB', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 188.98 x 35.43 inches; 1.13 Ounces'}
I like the color or this, but that’s pretty much it. It didn’t come out matte and the color came out way brighter than expected since it was on the darker side (I chose M02). Like most lipsticks, I expected it to transfer and it did, a lot. It practically came all the way off after minor eating. Maybe the color and matte would actually come out on a lighter or fair-skinned person.
Eh.
NATWAG Reusable Update Makeup Remover Cloths for Sensitive Skin - Microfiber Face Cloth Makeup Remover | Washable Round Makeup Remover Pads | Natural Facial Towels (2 Pads,2 Cloth) (Purple)
Natwag

This thing is amazing and the material so soft against my skin. It was able to get off my super stay lipstick that I usually need lipstick remover for. I use the small ones for my lips and eyes and the big one (it’s actually a really big cloth) I use for my face.
So soft
profile:
The user profile reflects a practical, eco-conscious individual who prioritizes convenience and functionality in portable products tailored for outdoor and travel settings. They value quality performance and reliability, seeking products that effectively meet essential needs. Their appreciation for subtle fragrances adds to their sensory enjoyment without being overpowering, aligning with their commitment to sustainability through choices in biodegradable materials.

Recent interactions reveal a discerning attitude toward product quality; while dissatisfied with some cosmetics, they have reported positive experiences with items offering appealing color outcomes and comfort. Their latest experience with cosmetic products highlighted a preference for balanced finishes, as they are mindful of how skin tone affects product performance.

The most recent interaction showcases their commitment to eco-friendly solutions and effective skin care. The user expressed high satisfaction with reusable makeup remover cloths, noting their exceptional softness and effectiveness in removing long-lasting products. This reinforces their inclination towards practical, sustainable choices that enhance daily routines.

Overall, the user continues to seek products that embody their values of convenience, effectiveness, sensory enjoyment, and eco-consciousness, coupled with a persistent pursuit of quality that significantly impacts their overall enjoyment and satisfaction.
